level.text: Delinquent rent and charges shall be collected in the same manner as delinquent real estate taxes.

If any tax remains unpaid after two (2) years from the date it is levied, the Director of Finance and Revenue shall send to the property owner a notice of intent to advertise the property for tax sale.
The notice required by ยง220.2 shall state, as a minimum, the following information:
The date of the tax sale;
The square and lot number of the property to be sold;
The amount of tax due; and
The last date on which the tax may be paid before the property will be advertised for sale.

level.heading: SOURCE
